paragraphs.text:
%spark

import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession
import org.apache.spark.SparkConf
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions.{row_number, max, broadcast}
import org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.Window
import org.apache.zeppelin.display.angular.notebookscope._
import AngularElem._


// on cree une session Spark avec un nom particulier pour la retrouver plus facilement dans le SparkUI
val mySession = SparkSession
  .builder()
  .config(new SparkConf()
             .setAppName("Projet les furets"))//rajouter comme parametre le nom de votre application
  .getOrCreate()


//Set Data path
val path= "/home/ec2-user/data/"

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession
import org.apache.spark.SparkConf
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions.{row_number, max, broadcast}
import org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.Window
import org.apache.zeppelin.display.angular.notebookscope._
import AngularElem._
mySession: org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession = org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession@4549a6c0
path: String = /home/ec2-user/data/
Import Highcharts library

paragraphs.text:
val country_code_filename = "country_transco.tsv"
val df_country_transco=mySession.read
                                .format("csv")
                                .option("header", true)
                                .option("delimiter", "\t")
                                .option("InferSchema", true)
                                .csv(path+country_code_filename)

val event_code_filename = "CAMEO.eventcodes.txt"
val df_event_code=mySession.read
                                .format("csv")
                                .option("header", true)
                                .option("delimiter", "\t")
                                .csv(path+event_code_filename)
                                
val event_code_list=df_event_code.filter(length($"CAMEOEVENTCODE")===2).collect()
AngularModel("event_code_list",event_code_list)

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra._
val df_events = spark.read.cassandraFormat("events","november").load()

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra._
df_events: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [sqldate: int, eventrootcode: int ... 6 more fields]

paragraphs.text:
val sql_mode=z.angular("date_mode")
val event_root_code=z.angular("event_code_filter").toString.toInt

val sql_month=z.angular("date_month_parsed")
val sql_date=z.angular("date_day_parsed")

if (sql_mode=="2"){
    val events_by_country=df_events.filter($"eventrootcode"===event_root_code)
        .filter($"monthyear"===sql_month)
        .groupBy($"monthyear", $"actiongeo_countrycode", $"eventrootcode")
        .agg(sum("nummentions")
            .alias("nummentions"))
    val events_agg_cleaned=events_by_country.alias("e").join(df_country_transco.alias("c"), $"e.actiongeo_countrycode"===$"c.fips").select($"c.ISO",$"e.nummentions")
    val events_json= events_agg_cleaned.collect()
    AngularModel("events",events_json)
}else{
    val events_by_country=df_events.filter($"eventrootcode"===event_root_code)
        .filter($"sqldate"===sql_date)
        .groupBy($"sqldate", $"actiongeo_countrycode", $"eventrootcode")
        .agg(sum("nummentions")
            .alias("nummentions"))
    val events_agg_cleaned=events_by_country.alias("e").join(df_country_transco.alias("c"), $"e.actiongeo_countrycode"===$"c.fips").select($"c.ISO",$"e.nummentions")
    val events_json= events_agg_cleaned.collect()
    AngularModel("events",events_json)
}

msg.data:
sql_mode: Object = 1
event_root_code: Int = 10
sql_month: Object = 201711
sql_date: Object = 20171110
res475: org.apache.zeppelin.display.angular.AbstractAngularModel = org.apache.zeppelin.display.angular.notebookscope.AngularModel@7f71bbc5

paragraphs.text:
%spark
val w = Window.partitionBy($"ISO").orderBy($"nummentions".desc)

val events_details_temp=df_events.alias("e").join(df_country_transco.alias("c"), $"e.actiongeo_countrycode"===$"c.fips")
    .select($"GLOBALEVENTID",$"SQLDATE",$"c.ISO",$"avgtone",$"nummentions",$"sourceurl")
    .filter($"eventrootcode"===event_root_code)

if (sql_mode=="2"){    
    val events_details=events_details_temp
        .filter($"MONTHYEAR"===sql_month)
        .orderBy(col("NumMentions").desc)
    val events_details_top = events_details.withColumn("rn", row_number.over(w)).where($"rn" <= 10).drop("rn")
    
    AngularModel("events_details",events_details_top.collect())        
}else{
    val events_details=events_details_temp
        .filter($"SQLDATE"===sql_date)
        .orderBy(col("NumMentions").desc)
    val events_details_top = events_details.withColumn("rn", row_number.over(w)).where($"rn" <= 10).drop("rn")
    
    AngularModel("events_details",events_details_top.collect())        
}

res478: org.apache.zeppelin.display.angular.AbstractAngularModel = org.apache.zeppelin.display.angular.notebookscope.AngularModel@40fc71f0

<script>
function show_event_details(data,countryCode){
    var data=data
    $('#event_date').text(data.date)
    $('#event_country_code').text(countryCode)
    $('#event_source').text(data.source)
    $('#event_source').attr("href",data.source)
    $('#event_tone').text(data.tone)
    $('#event_nbmentions').text(data.y)
    var scope = angular.element($("#details_id")).scope();
    scope.$apply(function(){
        scope.event_id = data.event_id.toString();
    })
    }
</script>

<form class="form-inline">
    <input id="details_id" type="hidden" class="form-control" id="event_id" ng-model="event_id"></input>
    <button id="btn_details" type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="z.angularBind('event_id',event_id,'20171226-174947_1637943596');z.runParagraph('20171226-174947_1637943596');z.runParagraph('20171226-234152_1297682268');z.runParagraph('20171227-104054_2145393657')">Load Details</button>
</form>

paragraphs.text:
%spark

val df_mentions = spark.read.cassandraFormat("mentions","november").load()

val df_mentions_filtered=df_mentions.filter($"GLOBALEVENTID"===z.angular("event_id"))
val mention_identifiers=df_mentions_filtered.select("MentionIdentifier").collect().map(_(0)).toList

val df_gkg = spark.read.cassandraFormat("gkg","november").load()

val df_gkg_filtered=df_gkg.filter($"DocumentIdentifier".isin(mention_identifiers: _*))
val df_mentions_details=df_mentions_filtered.alias("m").join(df_gkg_filtered.alias("g"), $"m.MentionIdentifier"===$"g.DocumentIdentifier").select($"GLOBALEVENTID",$"Date",$"m.MentionIdentifier",$"Locations",$"Persons",$"Confidence")
df_mentions_details.createOrReplaceTempView("mentions_details")

paragraphs.text:
%spark
val locations=df_mentions_details.select($"Locations").filter("Locations is not null").rdd.map(r => r(0))
val countries=locations.flatMap(line=> line.toString.split(";")).map(line => line.split("#")(2)).toDF("country_code")
.alias("e").join(df_country_transco.alias("c"), $"e.country_code"===$"c.fips")
.select($"c.ISO",$"c.lat",$"c.long")
val country_impact=countries.groupBy("ISO","lat","long").count().collect()
AngularModel("country_impact",country_impact)

%spark
val persons=df_mentions_details.select($"Persons").filter("Persons is not null").rdd.map(r => r(0))
val actors=persons.flatMap(line=> line.toString.split(";")).toDF("Actor")

actors.createOrReplaceTempView("event_actors")

paragraphs.text: %angular

%sql
select Actor, count(*) as nb_mentions
from event_actors
group by Actor
order by count(*) desc, Actor

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select GLOBALEVENTID,date,MentionIdentifier,Confidence from mentions_details
where confidence >= ${confidence=0}
order by date desc
